overview: Superstar cover model Roger Gharney is definitely one of the most beautiful men in adult video. But we love him because he really knows how to fuck! Roger puts costar Lewis Grant through the paces in New Tricks. Along with Roger and Lewis are Erik Haaz, Jerome Reynolds, Drago Lambeck, Casper Wats, Patty Cat, Phillip McDean and Jerry Harris burning up the screen for the first time with each other. You'll love how these tricks get off!
title: New Tricks
